guide.introduction: This project works best with 50mw or greater lasers. Be careful.
guide.introduction_rendered:
This project works best with 50mw or greater lasers. Be careful.

Relevant parts
  • two lenses, one diverging the other converging, a sheet of 1/16th inch plexi glass, 1/8th inch thick foam board, 1/16 inch or greater wood panels
Tools
  • X-Acto Knife, a.k.a. hobby knife, ruler, pencil

parts.text: two lenses, one diverging the other converging, a sheet of 1/16th inch plexi glass, 1/8th inch thick foam board, 1/16 inch or greater wood panels

lines.text: Gather the wood sides, I used 4 pieces of 50.5cm by 4.7cm wood. Width doesn't matter as much but I cut it to used .4cm.

lines.text: Glue three of the wood sides together in a box. It may be helpful to place a small wooden square on one end to ensure the sides set well.
